title: json pretty print
body: We now have json preview (at least in Spartan) https://wpdev.uservoice.com/forums/257854-internet-explorer-platform/suggestions/6509717-preview-json-response-in-browser?tracking_code=edea88fcd53ce1633f5178bcb66228b0.
